overview: Nesting is a story about Veikka (20), who is about to leave his work place - a construction site owned by Kari (50) - to start a new life in the big city.  Veikka thinks the goodbyes will go smoothly, but gets interrupted by a rare situation: thereâ€™s a baby in the crane.  The surprising problem is an annoyance at first, but in the end it opens up communication between the employees in a way that has been difficult in the past.
title: Nesting
